LanguageData.BEWH.PsychicPhenomena: Enabling this will make psykers who are experiencing mental breakdowns create a psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.BEWH.PsykerPariahBirth: Enabling this will allow children to be rarely and randomly born as psykers and pariahs.
LanguageData.BEWH.PsykerPariahBirthChance: Chance that newly born children will either be a psyker or pariah: {0}%
LanguageData.BEWH.PerpetualBirth: Enabling this will allow children to be rarely and randomly born as perpetuals.
LanguageData.BEWH.PerpetualBirthChance: Chance that newly born children will be a perpetual: {0}%
LanguageData.BEWH.UseChaosVersionForBanner: Use chaos version of the banner for the chapter ancient ability.
LanguageData.BEWH.LivingSaintChance: Chances for a lost Living Saint to resurrect
LanguageData.BEWH.Annihilation: A psychic blast surged through {0} and into the world, causing a warp explosion completely annihilating {0} and severely damaging everything around them.
LanguageData.BEWH.DaemonHost: A strong link was established between {0} and one of the chaos gods, allowing them to send in some daemons.
LanguageData.BEWH.UncontrollablePowers: In a temporary loss of control over their powers, {0} caused a warp explosion, causing damage to everyone near them.
LanguageData.BEWH.PsychicComa: Overwhelmed by the warp made {0} fall into a psychic coma.
LanguageData.BEWH.PsychicConnectionSevered: In an instant {0} no longer felt any connection to the warp, as if completely cut off.
LanguageData.BEWH.BloodRain: As if a cruel joke, blood suddenly starts raining.
LanguageData.BEWH.PlantRot: All plant life seems to rot in {0} presence, leaving it lifeless.
LanguageData.BEWH.NaturalBornXMessage: From the moment {0} became pregnant something felt off, something that has finally come to light. It seems that {1} has been born as a {2}.
LanguageData.BEWH.TwinConnectedDifferentMap: Twin is on a different map
LanguageData.BEWH.SelectMatrixDesc: Select matrix to gestate from among your matrices
LanguageData.BEWH.MissingGestateResearch: You have not researched any gestatable genetic matrices projects
LanguageData.BEWH.EjectGeneMatrixDesc: Ejects {0} from the gene gestator, allowing you to insert another
LanguageData.BEWH.StartGeneGestatingDesc: Starts the gestating process, once started it cannot be stopped
LanguageData.BEWH.GestateFinishMessage: {0} has been gestated into {1} and can now be implanted into a suitable pawn
LanguageData.BEWH.SelectXMaterialDesc: Select {0} material from among your available materials, if you have any
LanguageData.BEWH.PrimarchVatStartConfirmation: Are you sure you want to start this process?\n\nYou cannot stop this machine once started, and destruction of it will lead to loss of embryo.
LanguageData.BEWH.DeterioratingOutsideContainer: Will deteriorate due to being outside suitable container.
LanguageData.BEWH.ChillgronAbility: {0} is not in mental state or have any negative thoughts or memories
LanguageData.BEWH.ImplantGeneseedDesc: You are about to implant {0}, making them into a {1}
LanguageData.BEWH.OutsideOptimalAgeRange: {0} being outside the optimal age range {1}~{2} for this procedure
LanguageData.BEWH.CurrentFailureChance: Current failure chance is {0}%, failure will result in death and loss of gene-seed vial. This fail chance is a second check after a succesfull surgery.
LanguageData.BEWH.FailureChanceCausedBy: Current failure chance is caused by:
LanguageData.BEWH.FailureChanceCapped: Procedure failure chance was capped at {0}%
LanguageData.BEWH.AlreadySuperHuman: {0} is already a superhuman and cannot be enhanced again
LanguageData.BEWH.OrderImplantGeneseedDesc: Implant this gene-seed into a person to partially override their genetic code.\n\nThis is a surgical operation, so it requires a doctor, medical bed and {MEDICINEAMOUNT} medicine.
LanguageData.BEWH.LetterGeneseedOrderedImplanted: You have ordered a gene-seed be implanted in {PAWN_nameDef}. This procedure requires a medical bed and {MEDICINENEEDED} medicine.{BEDINFO}{MEDICINEINFO}\n\nYou can cancel this procedure by going to {PAWN_nameDef}'s health -> operations tab.
LanguageData.BEWH.GeneseedOrderedImplantedBedNeeded: \n\nYou do not have any medical beds available for {PAWN_nameDef}. Consider marking a bed as medical.
LanguageData.BEWH.GeneseedOrderedImplantedMedicineNee: \n\nYou do not have enough medicine to implant the gene-seed. Implanting cannot begin until you get {MEDICINENEEDED} medicine.
LanguageData.BEWH.CraftPrimarchEmbryo: Craft primarch embryo using an embryo from {0}
LanguageData.BEWH.NotSkilledEnoughPrimarchEmbryo: {0} is not skilled enough to craft a primarch embryo, needs {1}
LanguageData.BEWH.NoGeneManipulationTable: No gene manipulation table available to craft a priamrch embryo
LanguageData.BEWH.LivingSaintMessage: In {0}'s final moments they felt a surge of energy surging through them, invigorating and strengthening them. {0} was born anew as a living saint, stronger, faster and evermore loyal.
LanguageData.BEWH.LivingSaintReturnMessage: Though thought dead, {0}'s miracles keeps coming. It seem {0} sensed our situation from their afterlife and manifested themselves to help
LanguageData.BEWH.NoProgenoidGlands: Does not have any progenoid glands
LanguageData.BEWH.SMGeneseedExtractionNotResearched: Space Marine gene-seed extraction not researched
LanguageData.BEWH.PMGeneseedExtractionNotResearched: Primaris Marine gene-seed extraction not researched
LanguageData.BEWH.FirstGeneseedsHarvestableIn: Gene-seeds can be harvested in {0} days{1}.
LanguageData.BEWH.WarriorChanceToBerserk: {0}% chance to go berserk within half a day.
LanguageData.BEWH.NotEnoughPsyfocus: {0} does not have enough psyfocus to craft
LanguageData.BEWH.DeniedWitch: {0} psychic powers have been severed (Deny the Witch)
LanguageData.BEWH.LorgarDivinationNoIdeo: {0} is not part of any ideology
LanguageData.BEWH.PawnDoesNotHaveGeneToControl: {0} does not have the {1} gene which is required to control this mech
LanguageData.BEWH.PawnCannotControlMoreMechsOfType: {0} cannot control anymore {1} mechs, limit is {2}
LanguageData.BEWH.WillNotSummonAny: Will not summon any {0} as limit has been reached
LanguageData.BEWH.CraftPrimarchEmbryoGeneTableDesc: Select gene-seed vial and human embryo for creation of a primarch embryo
LanguageData.BEWH.AbilityDisabledNoDivineRadiance: {0_labelShort} does not have enough divine radiance.
LanguageData.BEWH.LowHolyRadiance: Living Saint {0_labelShort} holy radiance supply is dwindling.
LanguageData.BEWH.StasisResearchNotCompleted: {0} is about to enter stasis. You have not researched {1} and will have a hard time resurrecting {0} from stasis. \n\nUse with caution!
LanguageData.BEWH.ProofOfFaithGain: Will give {1} radiance and induce {0_labelShort} with coma for {2} days.
